thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 13 of 515
thread.title: Jane Campbell

author: Jane Campbell
title: Jane Campbell
text: I'm disappointed that as a VIP I have to choose a complete outfit to get the best discount rather than choosing separates. For example, an outfit that I could've ordered for $59.95 I ended up paying $84.85 simply because I wanted the Capri tights instead of the full-length tights. That was the only difference! I don't have a problem with you advertising an "outfit" but I think you should allow VIPs to choose the length of the tights they wish to order. This really is disappointing - and I'm sure the majority of your VIPs would feel the same.
